imageapp.filters¶

Functions

blur(image, radius, weight) This filter applies a blur to an image.
rgb(image) Decomposes an RGB image into three images, each with values on only one channel.
rotate(image, angle_degrees) Rotates the input image clockwise according to the angle.
imageapp.filters.blur(image, radius, weight)¶

This filter applies a blur to an image.

Parameters:
  • image (PIL.Image) – Image to be applied filter.
  • radius (str) – Radius to the convolution window.
  • weight (str) – Weight of the central pixel for the convolution.
imageapp.filters.rgb(image)¶

Decomposes an RGB image into three images, each with values on only one channel.

Parameters:image (PIL.Image) – Image to be applied filter.
imageapp.filters.rotate(image, angle_degrees)¶

Rotates the input image clockwise according to the angle.

Parameters:
  • image (PIL.Image) – Image to be applied filter.
  • angle_degrees (str) – Angle in degrees for rotation.
